Did you know Billie Eilish is the younge.content: ” won the Academy Award for best original song on Sunday night.” has raked in numerous trophies: In 2024 alone, they’ve won a Golden Globe for best original song and two Grammys.That beats a very old record set by Luise Rainer, who won her second best actress Oscar at 28 in 1938.The pair won their first Oscar for “No Time to Die” in 2021.In another music category, Ludwig Göransson won the Academy Award for original score for his work on Oppenheimer.

Zakir Hussain is a living example of Ind.content: The Indian band Shakti made the country proud at the Grammy Awards 2023 with its first cultural win.I know this because I have witnessed with my own eyes, the kind of dedication, John ji and Zakir bhai have given to Shakti, they are great masters of music.He is an ambassador for Indian classical music.Indian classical music has unique system that catches people's imagination everywhere.Coming to Indian classical music, there is an emotional quality to our music that transcends boundaries.

Oscars 2024: Did you spot these surprise.content:
Gosling's showstopping performance on Barbie's hit song 'I'm Just A Ken' was easily one of the best moments of the 96th Academy Awards.com/HZBgHz9tugGosling then moves to the audience again where Greta Gerwig, Margot Robbie and America Ferrera croon with the actor and he then walks over to Emma Stone who sings a line or two before he heads back to the stage where he is joined by Slash and Wolfgang Van Halen to end the epic performance.The Surprise guests during Gosling's performance

Gosling begins his performance from the audience section and has his Barbie co-star and producer Margot Robbie in splits.com/ERpoFrgSf5And @RyanGosling brings down the #Oscars house with @Slash and @SimuLiu as KEN!I CAN’T believe Simu Liu and all the guys came back for the Ken song!!

At 83, filmmaker Hayao Miyazaki earns hi.content: At 83, Miyazaki won for helming the best-animated film, The Boy and the Heron, the long-awaited fantasy from the director of Spirited Away, My Neighbor Totoro and Kiki’s Delivery Service.Sunday’s win for Miyazaki and producer Toshio Suzuki caps off a solid awards season run for the film, which won the top honour for an animated feature at the Golden Globes and the BAFTA Film Awards.Miyazaki worked through those concerns, and the resulting film earned him not only his second Oscar win on Sunday night, but his first No.It was Miyazaki’s fourth Oscar nomination for Best Animated Feature — tying with Pixar’s Pete Docter for the most nods in that category.Hayao Miyazaki, the legendary Japanese filmmaker whose anime classics have enchanted fans around the world for decades, has won his second career Oscar.

Vanessa Hudgens is pregnant! Debuts baby.content: So I think there is no shame in making the first move,” she said.Hudgens is expecting her first child with her husband, Cole Tucker.

Oscars 2024: Behind-the-scene pics you s.content: While the live show delivered epic performances and emotional speeches, some of the best moments of the evening happened behind the cameras.Overall, the 2024 Oscars was a night filled with memorable moments, both in front of the camera and behind.The 2024 Oscar Awards ceremony was a night to remember!Messi the Dog, who starred in Anatomy of a Fall, is seen comfortably sitting on a chair at the ceremony.Margot Robbie and director Greta Gerwig had the sweetest Barbie reunion before the ceremony began.

Ryan Gosling pays homage to Marilyn Monr.content: Ryan Gosling paid tribute to Marilyn Monroe's iconic "Diamonds Are a Girl's Best Friend" video at the 2024 Oscars, wearing a pink suit during his performance of "I'm Just Ken."Fans and viewers praised Gosling's performance, with one user saying, "absolutely LOVED Ryan Gosling’s live performance of #BarbieTheMovie 'I’m Just Ken' reimagined as a homage to GENTLEMEN PREFER BLONDES with him as the Marilyn Monroe."Gosling's performance echoed this style, with his dancers sporting black-and-white suits complemented by pink ribbons, bowties, socks, and cowboy hats inscribed with "Made especially for Ken.The performance featured large cartoon Barbie heads and concluded with guitarists Slash and Wolfgang Van Halen joining Gosling on stage.In Gentlemen Prefer Blondes, Monroe captivated audiences in a hot pink dress designed by William "Billy" Travilla, while male background dancers wore black suits with pink accents and bowties.

Emma Stone suffers wardrobe malfunction.content: Stone later explained to reporters in the pressroom that the mishap seemingly occurred during Ryan Gosling's performance of the best-original-song nominee "I’m Just Ken.In the post-show pressroom, Stone further elaborated on how her dress was fixed, saying, "They sewed me back in, right when I came back, it was wonderful.The mishap occurred as Stone ascended the stage to accept her second Academy Award for Best Actress, this time for her role in Poor Things.As she left the stage, Best Actress winners surrounded her, blocking the view of the back of her dress in a display of solidarity.The issue was quickly resolved backstage, with Stone expressing her gratitude for the seamstress who swiftly repaired the dress.

Netizens declare Ryan Gosling's ‘I’m Jus.content: Praising Ryan's ''Kenergy'', one user wrote, ''Ryan Gosling starting "i'm just ken" in the audience behind Margot Robbie who CANNOT stop laughing.But one unforgettable thing from the night that will surely go down in the history of the Academy is Ryan Gosling's energetic performance on the Oscar-nominated song ''I'm Just Ken'' from Greta Gerwig's movie Barbie.com/HDNKV7f1rTryan gosling starting "i'm just ken" in the audience behind margot robbie who CANNOT stop laughing.com/qPnFZl9HBvAnother wrote, ''Ryan Gosling singing I’m Just Ken might be the greatest Oscars moment ever!!''Ryan Gosling singing I’m Just Ken might be the greatest Oscars moment ever!!

Zee Cine Awards 2024: SRK bags Best Acto.content: Best Actor – Shah Rukh Khan (Jawan and Pathaan)Best Film – JawanBest Story – JawanBest Music – JawanBest Actor (Jury) – Kartik Aaryan (Satyaprem Ki Katha)Best Actress (Critics) – Alia BhattBest Actress (Jury) – Kiara AdvaniBest Actor in a Comic Role - Ayushmann KhurranaBest VFX – Red Chillies Entertainment (Jawan)Best Action – Spiro Razatos, Anal Arasu, Craig Macrae and team (Jawan)Best Background Music – Anirudh (Jawan)Best Music Director – Anirudh (Jawan)Best Dialogue – Sumit Arora (Jawan)Best Playback Singer (Male) – Arijit Singh (Jhoome Jo Pathaan – Pathaan)Best Playback Singer (Female) – Shilpa Rao (Besharam Rang – Pathaan)Best Lyrics – Kumaar (Chaleya – Jawan)Best Choreography – Bosco Martis (Jhoome Jo Pathaan – Pathaan)Best Costume Design – Manish Malhotra (Rocky Aur Rani Ki Prem Kahaani)Best Story – Atlee (Jawan)The Zee Cine Awards 2024 not only celebrated cinematic excellence but also marked a night of glamour, entertainment, and unforgettable moments in the world of Indian cinema.Shah Rukh Khan emerged as the night's biggest winner, clinching the Best Actor award for his outstanding roles in the films Jawan and Pathaan.The Zee Cine Awards 2024 brought together the crème de la crème of Bollywood and television on Sunday evening, where stars not only dazzled on the red carpet but also left a lasting impact on stage with stellar performances.Hosted by Ayushmann Khurrana and his brother Aparshakti Khurrana, Zee Cine Awards 2024 was a starry affair filled with glamour and entertainment.The star-studded evening featured captivating performances from Alia Bhatt, Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon, Ananya Panday, Bobby Deol, Ayushmann Khurrana, Mouni Roy, Utkarsh Sharma, and more.

Oscars 2024: Why celebs like Billie Eili.content: In a red carpet interview, Ramy Youssef emphasised the need for safety, justice, and peace for the Palestinian people, stating, "We're all calling for an immediate and permanent ceasefire in Gaza.At the 96th Academy Awards, several influential figures, including Billie Eilish, director Ava DuVernay, Mark Ruffalo, Ramy Youssef, and more, made a powerful statement by wearing red pins in support of a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas in Gaza.The pins were part of an effort launched by Artists4Ceasefire, which is a group of artists working in the entertainment industry who recently penned an open letter to Joe Biden to demand an immediate and permanent cease in Gaza.According to a press release, the pin symbolises collective support for "an immediate and permanent cease-fire, the release of all of the hostages and for the urgent delivery of humanitarian aid to civilians in Gaza".We really want lasting justice and peace for the Palestinian people.

Oscars 2024: Elon Musk compares event to.content: “Winning an Oscar now just means you won the woke contest,” he posted on X.Winning an Oscar now just means you won the wokeIn one of his latest posts, Musk compared the Oscars to a woke contest.But Elon Musk, who owns companies like Tesla and SpaceX, doesn't seem to be in a good mood.

Oscars 2024: A year after its historic w.content:
Oscar-nominated actors Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt paid tribute to the contribution of stunt coordinators in cinema across the world.Then, as Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande walked up to the stage to present the Best Original Score and Best Song Oscar- RRR's hit number Naatu Naatu played in the backdrop with Ram Charan and Jr NTR doing the signature step in the movie.com/cbNgFzMt72And again, a sweet surprise for us… 🔥🌊

Glad that @TheAcademy included #RRRMovie action sequences as part of their tribute to the world’s greatest stunt sequences in cinema.On Sunday, Hollywood celebrated the best of its cinema in 2023 at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles during the Oscar Awards.Many would recall that Naatu Naatu won the Best Song Oscar at the Oscars in 2023.

Oscars 2024 Snubs and Surprises: Maestro.content: Barring Best Actress which Emma Stone picked up for Poor Things, Oppenheimer was all over the Academy stage this year.Oscar Awards 2024: Seven wins for Oppenheimer, Barbie bags only one for Best SongAlso read: Indian art designer Nitin Desai remembered at the Oscar Awardscom/a0hNQ4ZP7jA major win for Emma Stone in the Best Actress category for her role in Poor Things kickstarted a debate on Lily Gladstone’s snub which many thought robbed the actress of her well-deserved win.I’m obsessed with the way Al Pacino announced Oppenheimer as Best Picture.”Also read: Jimmy Kimmel roasts Donald Trump for tweeting 'Get rid of Kimmel' on 'average' Oscars hostingHe also joked about Barbie director Greta Gerwig not getting a best director nod, saying, “Now, Barbie is a feminist icon, thanks to Greta Gerwig, who many believed deserved to be nominated for best director tonight.

Indian art designer Nitin Desai remember.content:
Every year, the Academy Awards pay tribute to people from the film industry who have passed away in the last one year in its 'In Memorium' segment.Oscars 2024: India's To Kill A Tiger loses out to 20 Days in Mariupol for Best Documentary Feature

In Memoriam segment at the Oscars

The 'In Memoriam' segment opened with a tribute to Alexei Navalny, Russia's opposition leader, who died last month.The 96th Academy Awards remembered renowned production designer Nitin Chandrakant Desai during the In Memoriam segment.In its previous edition, the Oscars featured actor Irrfan Khan and Oscar-winning costume designer Bhanu Athaiya in its tributes section, while Bollywood stars Rishi Kapoor and Sushant Singh Rajput found mention on the official website of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS).In 2022, the Academy, however, failed to pay tribute to Indian icons Lata Mangeshkar and Dilip Kumar who had passed away the previous year.

Jimmy Kimmel roasts Donald Trump for twe.content: Donald Trump’s tweet was read out loud by Jimmy on the stage after previous presenters for an award walked out and Jimmy had to fill the gap between incoming and outgoing presenters.Launching a scathing attack on Jimmy Kimmel, Donald Trump tweeted that Jimmy is the “worst host” that The Academy Awards has ever been a witness to and added that he was “trying too hard to be something which he is not, and never can be.You can trust Donald Trump to make an event like the Oscars all about himself after he tweeted harshly about this year’s host Jimmy Kimmel.Also read: Oscar Awards 2024: Oppenheimer sweeps the Oscars with 7 wins, Barbie only wins Best SongIn reply, Jimmy took the words quite sportingly and said, "Thank you for watching.It was only later that we found out it was an actual tweet by none other than Donald Trump.

Oscar Awards 2024: Seven wins for Oppenh.content: Meanwhile, actress Da’Vine Joy Randolph won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for her performance in The Holdovers.The film which led the nominations with 13 nods this year, won 7 awards including Best Picture, Best Director, Best Supporting Actor and Best Actor Oscar.Meanwhile, Martin Scorsese's Killers Of The Flower Moon earned a whopping 10 nominations but failed to win any Oscar on Sunday night.Poor Things was a close second with four awards - including Best Actress Oscar for Emma Stone.Murphy's stupendous performance as Robert J Oppenheimer in Nolan's film earned him his first nomination and first Oscar win.

Kate Middleton's first photo post-surger.content: "Thank you for your kind wishes and continued support over the last two months," read a message accompanying the photo on the social media platform X."Several news agencies, including the Associated Press and AFP, removed the first official photo released post-surgery of Britain's Princess Kate Middleton from their services on Sunday (March 10), amid doubts that the image had been manipulated.Thank you for your kind wishes and continued support over the last two months.com/6DywGBpLLQThe palace stated that the photo was taken "in Windsor earlier this week" by Kate's husband, Prince William.The photo, released by Kensington Palace to mark Mother's Day in Britain, shows the smiling Princess of Wales seated on a garden chair.

Crazy! John Cena walks nearly naked on t.content: ”After a fun banter, Kimmel invited Cena to present the award to the best costume designer, and then it was the moment when Cena finally took centre stage all naked, with a large envelope covering his private part and wearing a pair of sandals.Sending everyone in shock, the Peacemaker actor appeared naked on the Oscars stage to present the award for Best Costume Design.com/OWZ7pIelPZClearly, the funniest joke of the night on the Oscars was John Cena coming out naked on stage with only an envelope covering his golden treasures.”A naked John Cena and Jimmy Kimmel bicker on stage at the 2024 #Oscars pic.The awkward moment was planned marking the 50th anniversary of one of the most infamous Oscar moments from 1974 when Roberto Opel walked on the stage naked.
